page.title: 05GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
"The first thing I do when I get to school is play football some times we play rugby and bulldogs. Play time we all have a game of tennis and when I go home I play my computer. My favourite games are "Knock Out", "Shadow Fire"," Kung-Fu" and "Kong 2". I have about 150 computer games and it is very hard to pick which one to play. Then I go for a run then I play football I play for Llanelli rugby team and I play for the school football, rugby and cricket teams."
.........by KEVIN aged 11.
